body: # wls 1.0 # Web Directory Listing ![wls](https://raw.github.com/prashanta/wls/master/test/screen-1.png) ### Installation ---------------- Copy the contents of wls to the director that you want to have it managed. All the consequent sub folders will be managed. Yup, thats it. ### Which files are ignored? ---------------------------- - index.php - Any file/folder that begins with "." #### 3rd Party: - tablesorter: http://tablesorter.com/docs/
name: wls
